attributes.action: Take back Tier1 and Tier1 Dependent Visa Fee increase
attributes.additional_details:
Take back Tier1 and Tier1 Dependent Visa Fee increase

Tier1 visa fee has increased several times in last three years. There is no solid ground as to why the fee need to be increased. Any tier1 who applied with old fee must be at the same fee, there is no change in the tier1 procedure so the expenses incurring to UKBA are same.

Tier1 who are applying for extension or ILR must not be forced to pay more. They already pay tax and contribute to UK system same way as any other responsible citizen does. There is no point why they must pay increased fee.

So, the fee must same for any Tier1 extension or ILR or citizenship application for Tier1 who are already in UK.
